# Urban Network
## Overview
*Urban Network (Ex):* In small towns and in larger settlements, you can use the [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] skill to gather information in 1 hour. In villages and in smaller settlements, you can gather information in merely 2d10 minutes. You must spend at least 1 week in a settlement before you can use this ability there. 

**Source:** Class Acts: Rogues (Abandoned Arts), pg. 3
